channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Education Department Launches Investigation Into Maine After Trump Slams Governor Over Boys In Girls’ Sports

item.title: Spare Us Your Fake Modesty, Politicians
item.description: Aspiring officeholders increasingly disguise their obvious lust for power with a transparent sheen of public-spiritedness.
